# `math exp` for [math](/commands/categories/math.md)

<div class='command-title'>Returns e raised to the power of x.</div>

## Signature

```> math exp {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input        | output      |
| ------------ | ----------- |
| list\<number\> | list\<float\> |
| number       | float       |
## Examples

Get e raised to the power of zero
```nu
> 0 | math exp
1
```

Get e (same as 'math e')
```nu
> 1 | math exp
2.718281828459045
```
